self_predictions.prediction_summary: Alexey expresses deep respect for John Brzenk and emphasizes the honor of competing against him rather than focusing on winning. He aims to enjoy the process and showcase a beautiful fight.

John Brzenk.previous_match_summary: They met once before in a match that ended in a tie, with neither fully understanding the dynamics at the time.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Alexey acknowledges Devon's ability to adapt and win rematches but highlights Denis's finger and wrist strength and endurance. He hopes 'friendship will win,' indicating a diplomatic stance.

Denis Cyplenkov.strength: Strong fingers and wrist, can withstand long loads

Devon Larratt.strength: Good at adapting and winning rematches
